refnamediv.refpurpose: Shifts the contents of an audio variable into a 1-dimensional array.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This opcode can be used to push data from an audio variable into a 1-dimensional array. The array needs to be at least ksmps numbers long, but can be longer. Data is shifted in circularly, with the writing position moving by ksmps positions every k-cycle. When the array gets full, the writing position wraps around to the beginning of the array again (overwriting old positions). Together with the shiftout opcode, it can form a FIFO queue.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array, needs to be at least ksmps numbers long.
